pkgmetadata.longdescription: kaptl===========CLI for KAPTL generator. For more info, check https://www.kaptl.cominstallation------------ pip install kaptlSupported platforms-------------------Currently tested on Windows and Linux with Python 2.7. Should be usable on all modern platforms.Release notes-------------0.1.0~~~~~Initial releaseInfo====- Homepage: https://www.kaptl.com
